answer: Receiving a promotion in the last two years slightly reduces turnover rates.

indicator: Turnover Rate: Promotion slightly reduces turnover by 0.8%.
insight: (1) Employees with promotions have a turnover rate of 47.9%. (2) Those without promotions have a turnover rate of 48.7%. (3) The difference in turnover rates is minimal at 0.8%.
